author: Special Correspondent
text:
Former Union Minister and Tamil Maanila Congress leader G.K. Vasan has been re-elected chairman of the Board of Trustees of the Sri Tyagabrahma Mahotsava Sabha at the general body of the Sabha at Tiruvaiyaru on Wednesday.

The general body was held on the sidelines of the Sri Tyagarabrahmam's 169th aradhana celebrations that ended on Thursday.

Sabha president G.R. Moopanar presided, while secretaries Aridwaramangalam A.K. Palanivel and Srimushnam V. Raja Rao welcomed the gathering. Treasurer R. Ganesh submitted the audited accounts statement.

Sabha members re-elected Mr. G.R. Moopanar as president for the next three year term while re-electing Mr. Vasan as the Chairman, Board of Trustees.

Suresh Moopanar, clarinet maestro A.K.C. Natarajan, industrialist Nalli Kuppuswamy Chetti, Tyagarajan, Ganesan, Panjanatham, industrialist Deccan N.K. Moorthy, G. Srinivasan, Sundaram and Balasubramanian were elected trustees of the Sabha.
title: G. K. Vasan re-elected
